scripts.beta: node beta/chatbot.mjs && node beta/grammar.mjs && node beta/nsfw.mjs && node beta/tictactoe.mjs && node beta/toxicity.mjs
scripts.dev: uglifyjs main.js --comments all -o main.js && npm publish --tag dev
scripts.latest: uglifyjs main.js --comments all -o main.js && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.test: node test/chatbot && node test/grammar && node test/nsfw && node test/tictactoe && node test/toxicity
